rules_text:
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 1/1 black Cat Spirit creature token.
Whenever Kasha Wrangler attacks, [b][each opponent loses X life and you gain X life][/b], where X is the number of cards you have drawn this turn.
Paradigm {X}{B}{B} [i](You may cast this as a sorcery spell with only the text in square brackets for its paradigm cost.)[/i]
